dashboard.title: Accounts
dashboard.content: This link will navigate to the Accounts page, which outlines all the companies that have been added to this CRM system, in addition to useful information about each company.

dashboard.title: Contacts
dashboard.content: This link will navigate to the Contacts page, which displays a consolidated list of the people you are interacting with, along with their information.

dashboard.title: Opportunities
dashboard.content: This link will navigate to the Opportunities page, which illustrates all deals in each sales stage (new, closed, won, lost, etc).

dashboard.title: Global Search
dashboard.content: This is the global search box, where you can search for specific Companies, People, and Deals - all from one location.

dashboard.title: User Menu
dashboard.content: This user menu allows you quick access to log out of the system, as well as a link to your profile page, where you can modify your information and view your recent activity.

dashboard.title: Quick Create Menu
dashboard.content: The quick create button offers a simple way to create new Companies, People and Deals that you wish to add to this application.

dashboard.title: Activity Stream Filters
dashboard.content: The main content on this page is called the 'Activity Stream'. Not only will you be able to view your recent activity here, but the activities of your fellow employees that use this application! Clicking these blue filters will allow you to toggle between viewing all recent activities, only your activities, and activities that you've marked as your favorite.

dashboard.title: Activity Stream Timeline
dashboard.content: This button will display a visual timeline representation of the recent activity in your CRM system.

dashboard.title: Activity Stream Calendar
dashboard.content: This button will display a calendar representation of the recent activity in your CRM system.

dashboard.title: Activity Stream Post
dashboard.content: In this field you can post status updates, links, and even drag and drop file attachments for others to view.

dashboard.title: Agenda Widget
dashboard.content: This agenda widget outlines the meetings you have assigned for today, tomorrow, and in the future.

dashboard.title: Your CRM Instances
dashboard.content: This button allows you to change your CRM instance, and invite users to your instance as well. In addition, you can view users of this instance as well as their last login time.

dashboard.title: Todo List Widget
dashboard.content: This button opens up a todo list widget, where you can easily add/update/delete tasks assigned to you. If you're viewing a specific record, you can relate tasks to that record through this widget as well.
